articles.title: Canada's women's soccer team blanks Argentina behind 2nd-half rally
articles.description: Canada rallied in the second half, pulling ahead on an own goal and Cloe Lacasse's first senior strike to defeat 10-woman Argentina 2-0 in a women's international soccer friendly Thursday in Sanlúcar de Barrameda, Spain.
articles.content:
Canada rallied in the second half, pulling ahead on an own goal and Cloe Lacasse's first senior strike to defeat 10-woman Argentina 2-0 in a women's international soccer friendly Thursday in Sanlúcar de Barrameda, Spain.

articles.title: ‘Anxiety and nerves’: Lionel Messi confirms Qatar will be his last World Cup
articles.description: The Argentina star did not say if he will retire from national team after Qatar and believed Argentina can win as ‘anything can happen’
articles.content:
Lionel Messi has confirmed that the World Cup in Qatar next month will be the last of his career. The 35-year-old Argentina star will play in his fifth World Cup but is still seeking his first title at the showpiece tournament.

articles.title: Argentina legend Messi says 2022 World Cup will be his last
articles.description: Trending News & Rumors for Football, Basketball, Baseball, Hockey, Soccer & More
articles.content:
Lionel Messi will have one last opportunity to win football's most famous trophy after the Argentina icon confirmed that the 2022 World Cup in Qatar will be his final appearance at the tournament.
